translation: Whatever a great man does, others also do; whatever he establishes as the standard, the world follows.
commentary: 3.21 Whatever whatsoever? Acharya does? The best: the best? That's that? Eve only? The other the other? People: people? Sah he (that great man)? That what? evidence standard (authority? demonstration)? Kurute does? Lokah the world (people)? That that? follows follows.Commentary Man is a social animal. He is an imitating animal too. He takes his ideas of right and wrong from those whom he regards as his moral superiors.
